overview: Oliver is a Filipino entrepreneur and businessman. He holds an MBA with Distinction from Harvard Business School where he was a LeBarron-MacArthur-Ellis Fellow and a board director of the Harbus News Corporation. His work experience spans consumer products, publishing, real estate and e-commerce. Oliver worked with Procter & Gamble Asia, where he helped launch new products and marketing campaigns for emerging markets in Asia. After business school, he returned to Manila and co-founded a real estate company and an e-commerce start-up.
